Text: My Norton Anti-virus software detected a trojan in several of these downloads. What's up?

I would like a view of at least one more downloader ( 192 downloaders who downloaded this torrent  can't be wrong !) before I post a request for removal of this torrent. Be sure that its a not a False +ive.

My apologies. It seems my Anti-Virus software considered the "keygen" to be a trojan. How to I get around that and still keep my computer safe?  Many thanks.

@'carolynmil' - Your computer is safe if you use the Keygen. This is what the nerds call 'False Positive' - No harm is done to your computer. Switch off / disable your antivirus while using the keygen. Switch on / enable the anti virus after using the keygen, and you have a fully functional software and no harm to your computer !
